data.name: Shin Megami Tensei III Nocturne HD Remaster - Merciful Difficulty
data.detailed_description:
Adds the MERCIFUL difficulty.

Suggested for beginners or those who want to enjoy the story.
Selectable at New Game. Also changeable at any time from the Config menu.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 8.1
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 or AMD Phenom II X2 545
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 450, 1 GB or AMD Radeon HD 5750, 1 GB or Intel HD Graphics 530
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 14 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: DLC Disk Space: 1.4 KB
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-550 or AMD Phenom II X2 560
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 450, 1 GB or AMD Radeon HD 5770, 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 14 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: DLC Disk Space: 1.4 KB
